name: Caveman Tales
description:
SNES game inspired by point and click adventure games.

Hunt down all of the dinosaurs hidden in the forest.

KEYBINDS

  • A - S
  • B - D
  • X - W
  • Y - A
  • DPAD - Arrow Keys
  • START - T
  • L and R - Q and E

Uses the pixeloid font by GGBOT

https://ggbot.itch.io/pixeloid-font
